body_html:
Reopening this–I misspoke. The issue still happens (I just didn't test it enough). Still getting nans sometimes; whereas most of the time the code works.

Confirmed the bug is still there on the latest pytorch, 1.0.0.dev20181118.

Any ideas on how to debug this?

body:
Reopening this–I misspoke. The issue still happens (I just didn't test it enough). Still getting nans sometimes; whereas most of the time the code works.

Confirmed the bug is still there on the latest pytorch, `1.0.0.dev20181118`.

Any ideas on how to debug this?
